caption.p: a Effects of PHS exposure on lethality b Effects of PHS exposure on lifespan c Effects of PHS exposure on body length d Effects of PHS exposure on brood size e Effects of PHS exposure on head thrash f Effects of PHS exposure on body bend Exposures were performed from L4-larvae to young adult. PHS, seeds of Peganum harmala L.. C.elegans L4-larvae to young adults were exposed to PHS. * P < 0.05, ** P < 0.01, *** P < 0.001. The “control” is normal N2 worms
